trans-unit.source: Represents a security token that is based upon a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 表示基于 SAML 断言的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: The claims for <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens are expressed as part of a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全令牌的声明表示为 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> 的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> has an extensible set of claims known as SAML statements that are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Statements%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> 具有一组可扩展的声明，这些声明称为 SAML 语句，由 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Statements%2A> 属性表示。

trans-unit.source: The SAML authority that issued the SAML assertion is specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Issuer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 颁发 SAML 断言的 SAML 授权机构在 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Issuer%2A> 属性中指定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion" /> that represents the SAML assertion for this security token.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion" />，表示此安全令牌的 SAML 断言。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> class using the specified SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 SAML 断言初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.Initialize%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion%29> method, which can be overridden in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数调用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.Initialize%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion%29> 方法，该方法可在派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens, the claims are specified using a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全令牌，声明是使用 SAML 断言指定的。

trans-unit.source: Gets the SAML assertion for this security token.
trans-unit.target: 获取此安全令牌的 SAML 断言。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion" /> that represents the SAML assertion for this security token.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion" />，表示此安全令牌的 SAML 断言。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens, the claims are specified using a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全令牌，声明是使用 SAML 断言指定的。

trans-unit.source: Use a constructor or the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.Initialize%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion%29> method to set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.Assertion%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用构造函数或 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.Initialize%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion%29> 方法可设置 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.Assertion%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that specifies the key identifier to create.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" />，指定要创建的密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this security token is capable of creating the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此安全令牌能否创建指定的密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when <paramref name="T" /> is of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 的类型为 <paramref name="T" />，则为 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.CanCreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token can create a specific key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.CanCreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> 方法可确定 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全令牌能否创建特定密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: To create the key identifier call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%60%601> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建密钥标识符，请调用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%60%601> 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that specifies the key identifier to create.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" />，指定要创建的密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: Creates the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 创建指定的密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause" /> that is a key identifier clause for a SAML security token.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause" />，它是 SAML 安全令牌的密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.CanCreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token can create a specific key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.CanCreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> 方法可确定 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全令牌能否创建特定密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: To create the key identifier call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%60%601> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建密钥标识符，请调用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%60%601> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="T" /> is not of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="T" /> 的类型不是 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: 获取安全令牌的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: 安全令牌的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token is serialized into XML, the value of the Id attribute is set to the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.Id%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全令牌序列化为 XML 时，Id 属性 (Attribute) 的值设置为 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.Id%2A> 属性 (Property) 的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion" /> that represents the SAML assertion for this security token.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion" />，表示此安全令牌的 SAML 断言。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the properties of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> class using the specified SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 SAML 断言初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> 类的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion%29> constructor calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.Initialize%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion%29> method, which can be overridden in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.%23ctor%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion%29> 构造函数调用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.Initialize%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion%29> 方法，该方法可在派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens, the claims are specified using a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全令牌，声明是使用 SAML 断言指定的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assertion" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assertion" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the key identifier for this instance is equal to the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例的密钥标识符与指定的密钥标识符是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="keyIdentifierClause" /> is a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause" /> and it has the same unique identifier as the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.Id" /> property; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 为 <paramref name="keyIdentifierClause" />，并且具有与 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause" /> 属性相同的唯一标识符，则为 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.Id" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cryptographic keys associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: 获取与安全令牌相关联的加密密钥。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" /> that contains the set of keys associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" />，包含与安全令牌相关联的密钥集。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.SecurityKeys%2A> property to set the cryptographic keys for this security token to protect a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.SecurityKeys%2A> 属性可为此安全令牌设置加密密钥，以便保护 SOAP 消息。

trans-unit.source: The keys can be used, among other things, to digitally sign or encrypt SOAP messages.
trans-unit.target: 密钥可用于（但不限于）数字签名或加密 SOAP 消息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the first instant in time at which this security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: 获取此安全令牌有效的最初时刻。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the first instant in time at which this security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，表示此安全令牌有效的最初时刻。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> properties to determine the time period in which a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> token is valid.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> 和 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> 属性可确定 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 令牌有效的时间段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> properties represent the first and last instants in time in which the security token is valid, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> 和 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> 属性分别表示此安全令牌有效的最初时刻和最后时刻。

trans-unit.source: By default, a 5-minute clock skew is allowed between the sender and receiver of the security token.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，安全令牌的发送方和接收方之间允许存在 5 分钟的时钟偏差。

trans-unit.source: So, if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A> property is set to 1:00 PM, then the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> property is set to 12:55 PM.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A> 属性设置为 1:00 PM，则 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> 属性可设置为 12:55 PM。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> property is set to <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>, then the SAML assertion associated with this <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token does not have any conditions set.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> 属性设置为 <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>，则与此 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全令牌相关联的 SAML 断言没有设置任何条件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: 获取此安全令牌有效的最后时刻。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，表示此安全令牌有效的最后时刻。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> properties to determine the time period in which a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> token is valid.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> 和 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> 属性可确定 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 令牌有效的时间段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> properties represent the first and last instants in time in which the security token is valid, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> 和 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> 属性分别表示此安全令牌有效的最初时刻和最后时刻。

trans-unit.source: By default, a 5-minute clock skew is allowed between the sender and receiver of the security token.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，安全令牌的发送方和接收方之间允许存在 5 分钟的时钟偏差。

trans-unit.source: So, if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A> property is set to 1:00 PM, then the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> property is set to 1:05 PM.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A> 属性设置为 1:00 PM，则 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> 属性可设置为 1:05 PM。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> property is set to <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>, then the SAML assertion associated with this <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token does not have any conditions set.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> 属性设置为 <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>，则与此 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全令牌相关联的 SAML 断言没有设置任何条件。
